Footloose.description: A rebellious teenager moves to a small town where dancing is banned and fights to bring it back.

Apollo 13.description: The story of the ill-fated Apollo 13 lunar mission and the astronauts' struggle to return home.

Mystic River.description: Three childhood friends are reunited by a tragedy that forces them to confront their past.

X-Men: First Class.description: A prequel to the X-Men series, exploring the origins of the mutant team and their first battle.

Crazy, Stupid, Love.description: A middle-aged man navigates the dating world after his wife leaves him, with help from a young bachelor.
